name: NATIONAL RELIGIOUS CAMPAIGN AGAINST TORTURE
sampleDescriptions: The National Defense Authorization Act.  Refugees.  Bigotry against Muslims.  Executive branch nominations. Guantanamo.  Increasing the U.S. contribution to the UN Voluntary Fund for Victims of Tortur
